医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现两种常见糖尿病药物之间的联系对足部溃疡愈合的影响研究表明，当二甲双胍与胰岛素联合使用时，糖尿病足溃疡渗出物中的二甲双胍含量会升高，这凸显了改善伤口愈合疗法的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Researchers-uncover-connection- Between-two-common-diabetes-drugs-with-implications-for-foot-ulcer-healing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Researchers-uncover-connection- Between-two-common-diabetes-drugs-with-implications-for-foot-ulcer-healing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2e05cac-a143-4519-a93e-1e2092c76fa5 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 05:31:00 -0400 Researchers uncover connection between two common diabetes drugs with implications for foot ulcer healing
新研究发现护肤品可能会让儿童接触有害的邻苯二甲酸盐儿童护肤品与尿液中邻苯二甲酸盐的含量有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-study-finds-skincare-products-could-expose-children-to-harmful-phaates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-study-finds-skincare-products-could-expose-children-to-harmful-phaates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fa0a04a-0757-4200-85fb-ab057da1465f Mon, 09 Sep 2024 04:20:00 -0400 New study finds skincare products could expose children to harmful phthalates
戒烟的最佳方法：新 Cochrane 分析证明电子烟、药物和咨询有效最近的 Cochrane 评论强调了有效的戒烟干预措施，揭示了研究差距以及改进烟草成瘾策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Best-ways-to-quit-smoking-E-cigs-medications-and-counseling-proven- effective-in-new-Cochrane-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Best-ways-to-quit-smoking-E-cigs-medications-and-counseling-proven- effective-in-new-Cochrane-analysis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1afb0aa8-62cf-4cd6-b6ab-7496cfe044c3 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 03:38:00 -0400 Best ways to quit smoking: E-cigs, medications, and counseling proven effective in new Cochrane analysis
长期接触交通噪音和空气污染会增加不孕风险研究人员探讨了男性和女性长期接触道路交通噪音、空气污染和不孕症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Long-term-exposure-to-traffic-noise-and-air-pollution-linked-to-increased-infertility-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Long-term-exposure-to-traffic-noise-and-air-pollution-linked-to-increased-infertility-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6ce3e29-0476-465a-8515-cd195ed43555 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 02:58:00 -0400 Long-term exposure to traffic noise and air pollution linked to increased infertility risk
研究人员提出生酮饮食作为神经性厌食症的一种新疗法研究确定了一种神经生物学模型，支持生酮饮食作为神经性厌食症的治疗方法，解决代谢和心理因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Researchers-propose-ketogenic-diet-as-a-novel-treatment-for-anorexia-nervosa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Researchers-propose-ketogenic-diet-as-a-novel-treatment-for-anorexia-nervosa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9e719a7-f300-4493-9327-3c1f388a630a Mon, 09 Sep 2024 00:33:00 -0400 Researchers propose ketogenic diet as a novel treatment for anorexia nervosa
中国养殖毛皮动物被发现携带数十种新型病毒研究人员在中国养殖毛皮动物中发现了 125 种病毒，其中包括 36 种具有显着人畜共患潜力的新型病毒，强调需要加强监测以预防未来的流行病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Chinese-farmed-fur-animals-found-to-harbor-dozens-of-novel-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Chinese-farmed-fur-animals-found-to-harbor-dozens-of-novel-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50f7ecef-6471-4085-a075-907a9e9092b0 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 00:01:00 -0400 Chinese farmed fur animals found to harbor dozens of novel viruses
长期新冠肺炎对儿童的影响长达 36 个月，疫苗提供至关重要的保护研究揭示了长期新冠肺炎对儿童的显着而持久的影响，强调了疫苗的保护作用和自身免疫性疾病风险的增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Long-COVID-significantly-affects-children-for-up-to-36-months-vaccines-offer-crucial-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Long-COVID-significantly-affects-children-for-up-to-36-months-vaccines-offer-crucial-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=172d7c77-57d6-4c82-94d0-f06a60e1c9e3 Sun, 08 Sep 2024 23:09:00 -0400 Long COVID significantly affects children for up to 36 months, vaccines offer crucial protection
研究表明饮酒量增加直接增加痴呆风险研究表明，由遗传因素驱动的较高饮酒量与痴呆风险增加相关，这挑战了适度饮酒可能具有保护作用的观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Study-shows-increased-alcohol-conspiration-directly-raises-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Study-shows-increased-alcohol-conspiration-directly-raises-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4eb2303e-62d5-40a0-8158-b4e932aa37be Sun, 08 Sep 2024 22:41:00 -0400 Study shows increased alcohol consumption directly raises dementia risk
生白大蒜有望促进心脏健康和降低疾病风险审查强调了食用生白大蒜的潜在健康益处，特别是在改善心脏代谢生物标志物和降低慢性疾病风险方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Raw-white-garlic-shows-promise-in-boosting-heart-health-and-reducing-disease-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240908/Raw-white-garlic-shows-promise-in-boosting-heart-health-and-reducing-disease-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6afbd5db-9095-4543-bf2d-dd3c2d79774b Sun, 08 Sep 2024 22:19:00 -0400 Raw white garlic shows promise in boosting heart health and reducing disease risks
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 为突破性器官移植研究提供数百万美元资助寺崎生物医学创新研究所的研究人员获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的数百万美元拨款，用于推进器官移植和抗体介导的排斥反应的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/NIH-awards-multi-million-grant-for-groundwriting-organ-transplantation-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/NIH-awards-multi-million-grant-for-groundwriting-organ-transplantation-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78a8e752-0d94-400e-8e1a-452bb1119a7d Fri, 06 Sep 2024 23:57:00 -0400 NIH awards multi-million grant for groundbreaking organ transplantation research
